name: field_resource_naming
description: Validates that field and resource naming follows Solace REST API conventions as per ADR

conditions.message: URL structure must start with /api/v2/<product area>/
Resources that are collections must be represented by plural nouns (ex. /api/v2/platform/environments)
IDs that refer to other resources must be prefixed with the type of object (ex. organizationId)
The resource being accessed should only use 'id' as the field
The path must not include an organization ID variable as it is defined by the bearer token
Resources and fields must use camel case (ex. organizationName)
No shortened words; prefer 'organization' over 'org' (with documented exceptions)
Camel case to be used for abbreviations (ex. awsVpc)
